entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
